attributes.action: stop central government looking for Hi-tech solutions to all problems.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Central government continually tries to use technology, often inappropriately. To reduce congestion uses toll booths with variable rates.  To cut down on car emissions provide centrally funded school buses for all.  And for heavens sake stop tying to fund large scale computer systems.  Bigger is not always best – start with small amounts of connectivity and allow the systems to evolve.
